data.name: The Master's Pupil
data.detailed_description:
The Master’s Pupil is a hand painted puzzle adventure game set inside the eye of an artist.

Solve puzzles and wander your way across the iris and through the life of master Impressionist painter Claude Monet.

The linear 2D platformer, taking about 4-5 hours to complete, features twelve levels of mind-bending puzzles based on colour, physics and space. Lovingly hand painted landscapes are combined with dynamic and emotional set pieces, soundscapes, and music.

Although The Master’s Pupil is about Monet, it is not a traditional biography. No language, written or spoken, describes the artist or his life. Rather his world filters into the player’s world via a rich and dynamic soundscape, with his emotions represented by an equally dynamic score.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
